select talent_private_followup.id, user.id as followup_id, user.username as followUp, talent_private_followup.time, talent_private_followup.next_time, talent_private_followup.remark from talent_private_followup left join talent_private on talent_private.id = talent_private_followup.private_id left join talent_info on talent_info.id = talent_private.info_id left join user on user.id = talent_private_followup.followup_id where talent_info.dlt = 'NO' and talent_info.id = #{id} order by id desc
limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
